Skip to contents
CohortSymmetry 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    A tidy visualization of sequence_symmetry objects.

    tidySequenceSymmetry.Rd

    It provides a tidy dataframe with the contents of the summariseSequenceRatio output.

    Usage

    tidySequenceSymmetry(result)

    Arguments

    result

    A sequence_symmetry object.

    Value

    A tibble with a tidy version of the sequence_symmetry object.

    Examples

    # \donttest{
library(CohortSymmetry)
cdm <- mockCohortSymmetry()
cdm <- CohortSymmetry::generateSequenceCohortSet(cdm = cdm,
                                                 name = "joined_cohorts",
                                                 indexTable = "cohort_1",
                                                 markerTable = "cohort_2",
                                                 combinationWindow = c(0, Inf))
res <- CohortSymmetry::summariseSequenceRatio(
cdm = cdm,
sequenceCohortSet = "joined_cohorts")
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution

#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR denominator is 0, suggesting no Marker Drug -> Index Drug or Index Drug -> Marker Drug events
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR denominator is 0, suggesting no Marker Drug -> Index Drug or Index Drug -> Marker Drug events
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR denominator is 0, suggesting no Marker Drug -> Index Drug or Index Drug -> Marker Drug events
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR denominator is 0, suggesting no Marker Drug -> Index Drug or Index Drug -> Marker Drug events
#> Warning: NSR numerator is 0, which results in a NSR = 0, proceed with caution
#> Warning: NSR denominator is 0, suggesting no Marker Drug -> Index Drug or Index Drug -> Marker Drug events

tidy_result <- CohortSymmetry::tidySequenceSymmetry(res)

tidy_result
